# NaViT
My implementation of "Patch n’ Pack: NaViT, a Vision Transformer for any Aspect Ratio and Resolution"

[Paper Link](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2307.06304.pdf)

# Appreciation
* Lucidrains
* Agorians

# Install
`pip install na-vit`
